    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_79020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Formation of nylon-6 through the polymerisation of a  caprolactam ring</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anordnung von nylon-6 durch die Polymerisierung 
eines Caprolactamringes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Formation de nylon-6 par la polymérisation d'une 
boucle de caprolactame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Formação de nylon-6 com a polimerização de um
anel do caprolactam</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione di nylon-6 con la polimerizzazione di 
un anello del caprolattame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματισμός νάυλον-6 μέσω του πολυμερισμού ενός 
caprolactam δαχτυλιδιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Formación de nylon-6 con la polimerización de 
un anillo del caprolactam</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the formation of nylon-6  through the polymerisation of the caprolactam ring. Nylon-6 is made from a single monomer of caprolactam, which is a cyclic amide that contains six carbon atoms.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">caprolactam ring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cyclic amide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">monomer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nylon-6</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polymerisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Anordnung von nylon-6 
durch die Polymerisierung des Caprolactamringes. Nylon-6 wird 
von einer einzelnen Monomere des Caprolactams gebildet, das ein 
zyklisches Amid ist, das sechs Kohlenstoffatome enthält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la formation de nylon-6 
par la polymérisation de la boucle de caprolactame. Nylon-6 est
fait à partir d'un monomère simple du caprolactame, qui est une 
amide cyclique qui contient six atomes de carbone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a formação de nylon-6 
com a polimerização do anel do caprolactam. Nylon-6 é feito 
de um único monomer do caprolactam, que é um amido cíclico que 
contenha seis átomos de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la formazione di 
nylon-6 con la polimerizzazione dell'anello del caprolattame. 
Nylon-6 è fatto da un singolo monomero di caprolattame, che è 
un'ammide ciclica che contiene sei atomi di carbonio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το σχηματισμό νάυλον-6 
μέσω του πολυμερισμού του caprolactam δαχτυλιδιού. 
Νάυλον-6 γίνονται από ένα ενιαίο μονομερές caprolactam,
το οποίο είναι ένα κυκλικό αμίδιο που περιέχει έξι άτομα 
άνθρακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la formación de 
nylon-6 con la polimerización del anillo del caprolactam. 
Nylon-6 se hace de un solo monomer del caprolactam, que es una 
amida cíclica que contiene seis átomos de carbón.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
